message:
Eta reduction proposed. It's recommended to rewrite 'fun ch ->
                                                       Char.escaped ch' as 
'Char.escaped'

Eta reduction proposed. It's recommended to rewrite 'fun x -> fun y -> x ^ y' as 
'(^)'

Eta reduction proposed. It's recommended to rewrite 'fun init -> go init' as 
'go'

Unneeded mutual recursion detected in these type declarations. It's recommended to rewrite 'is_rec' as follows:
type is_rec = bool[@@deriving show { with_path = false }]

Unneeded mutual recursion detected in these type declarations. It's recommended to rewrite 'unar_oper' as follows:
type unar_oper =
  | Negative 
  | Not [@@deriving show { with_path = false }]
OCaml files should provide license information in second line (structure item)
